name: Risky Rolling
description:
Risky Rolling is a 2D top down shoot'em up where you survive against hordes of coin enemies as long as you can.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. Theme was "Roll of the Dice"

Who's got better chances, a coin or a dice? Survive as long as you can!

Roll and Dodge enemy bullets, but keep in mind how bullets you have.

The number of bullets in your magazine is randomized every time you dodge roll from 1 - 6.

Controls:
WASD / Arrow keys : movement
SPACEBAR : Dodge roll
Left Mouse Button: Shooting.

Assets I didn't make:
[16x16] Small Indoor Tileset by https://tilation.itch.io/
Gunshot Audio from: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-sound-effects-download/gun-shooting...

Font: https://www.fontspace.com/pixel-emulator-font-f21507
